title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, October 2, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of Nat Turner (Virginia, 1800), who led one of the most famous and effective slave revolts in the Americas in 1831.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of Nat Turner (Virginia, 1800), who led one of the most famous and effective slave revolts in the Americas in 1831.
